definition: currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Clicking a cell or a row header selects the full row.
sentences.chinese: 單擊單元格或行標題可以選擇整行。

sentences.english: Elements on your page do not have to be confined to individual grid units. In a five-column grid, 5 narrow columns of text can be hard to read.
sentences.chinese: 你無須強制你頁面上的元素都限制於單個單元格。

sentences.english: But what data does each cell hold?
sentences.chinese: 但是每個單元格存有什麼數據呢？

sentences.english: You can edit the name and type of the key by clicking on the cell.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過單擊單元格編輯鍵名和類型。

sentences.english: SetCell: Set a value into a cell on one of the workbook's sheets.
sentences.chinese: 對工作薄中某一工作表上的單元格設置值。

sentences.english: You don't have to fill every little grid unit.
sentences.chinese: 你也不需要填滿每一個小單元格。

sentences.english: In this conversion, many of the code lists have empty cells.
sentences.chinese: 在這個轉換中，許多代碼清單都具有空單元格。

sentences.english: Gets the zero-based row index of the cell.
sentences.chinese: 獲取單元格的從零開始的行索引。

sentences.english: Next, you need to fill in the remaining cells.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，需要填充餘下的單元格。

sentences.english: If you double-click a worksheet cell, the cell changes to edit mode.
sentences.chinese: 當雙擊工作表單元格時，該單元格將切換到編輯模式。

sentences.english: If you double-click a worksheet cell, the cell changes to edit mode.
sentences.chinese: 當雙擊工作表單元格時，該單元格將切換到編輯模式。

sentences.english: The modification for cells in Spreadsheet 3 was made due to my wrong fill-out.
sentences.chinese: 調整的表3中的單元格部分是由於我填錯了。

sentences.english: You can only merge two rows when number of cells and sizes are the same.
sentences.chinese: 單元格數目和大小相同時，只能合併兩行。

sentences.english: Spacing is the space between boundaries of neighboring cells.
sentences.chinese: 間隔指的是相鄰單元格間的邊界。

sentences.english: There is an experimental facility for cell-writeback.
sentences.chinese: 有一個單元格回寫的實驗工具。

sentences.english: The cell contents, both in text content and color, are reused across the matrix.
sentences.chinese: 單元格內容，包括文本內容和顏色，都在矩陣中重用。
